turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hello there

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I hope you're having a decent day! I wanted to ask you something, something very important.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sure, ask away

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have you by chance heard of Save the Children organization?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have seen it on TV a couple times yes.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's great to hear, though it is hard to get the word out to people. You see, this organization is in desperate need of donations. I was hoping I could possibly persuade you into making a donation? This is for a great cause, after all I feel as though we need to do what we can in order to help other's around the world, especially ones that are in desperate need of our help - don't you agree?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sure I could agree with that, children are the future so we should do what we can to ensure theirs.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Excellent, great to hear! How much would you like to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount, from 0$ to all of your payment with the total of 2$. Any amount would be helpful, though an amount of 2$ may be small to us - we could buy candy, or something we can easily get whenever we want but to the kids, this could be a lifesaver, so every penny counts!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Ok so how will it work if I decide to done a portion?  The researchers will take care of it?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, you have nothing to worry about. The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds fair, is save the children government sponsored?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No, it is a non-govermental organization that helps promote children's rights, providing relief and helps support children in developing countries. Which I think is amazing, how selfless are the people who came up with this? I just know that donating a small bit of money can really help them get one step closer to their goals. So, have you decided on the amount you'd like to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Almost, do you happen to know if their work is world-wide or only focused on developing countries?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: As I stated before, it is set up to support children within developing countries. Hopefully one day it will be world- wide. With your help in donating however, that could be one step closer to world-wide help!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Very well, I will donate 0.75 of my bonus to the cause

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's amazing! Thank you so much for your donation!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Not a problem, we should always try to help the children!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree completely, you have a wonderful day!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You as well thanks!
